1.content:
Ok let me introduce myself.
Im professor Darkcrow of Istra! Welcome to my native region. Darkness slowly consumes it, and finally there is the band Giantio who want to steal our legendary pokemon Shinous, Shamshii and Amporaid to absob their energy and turn all teen girls to giantesses! Yikes!
I wanted you to stop them, but rules are rules - you should beat elite 4 and champion to become strong enough......
Ok, now off to Istra!
1.title: Off to Istra

info.brief_description: Go on adventure to Istra region and become a Master of pokemon
info.description:
You are from Eribia town of Istra region
Your rival is Anna a beginning trainer
The towns are
Eribia- Leader Stepanich a user of BUG
Ukai Galina - Flying type
Okgaonk Temnirra STEEL type
Tzibiz Sergey ROCK type
Berezia Flora Grass type
Seano Evgenia WATER type
Istra-LOC (there is a pokemon league)
Blindark Christina DARK type
Firsania Marina NORMAL type
Blindlight
The POKEMON of Istra are all new I ll add them
